description: Just Air Technology is an air chamber system that protects your iPad from shock, bumps and grinds. The air chambers have been placed at every corner and every side of the case to ensure that any impact is softened and any blow to your iPad is reduced almost completely. Designed with strong metal zipper pulls and an outer layer of neoprene, this slim design allows for easy packing, travel and everyday use.
title: Just Air Case for Ipad - Black (8271)
